attributes.action: Abolish the totally useless and unecessarily costly Home Information Packs (HIP's)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel I am not alone in being incensed by the government's latest fatuous edict that HIP's have now to be in order - before a house can even go 
on the market. 

HIP's are a totally ill-conceived, useless and costly piece of typical Brown'esque bureaucratic nonsense which far from assisting a sale/purchase will have the immediate opposite effect of making many people think twice about selling - period.

Already subsumed by agent's fees, solicitors costs and the iniquitous stamp duty et al - in a time when leeway and assistance is deserately needed - the potential seller/buyer
is being squeezed to breaking point.

It should be abolished - now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
